quiz_1_question.eng: True or False: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship should only be made by one spouse.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng:

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng:

rows.text_1_facilitator: Letâ€™s observe how couples can value each otherâ€™s opinions and make decisions together:

text_1_facilitator.eng: Letâ€™s observe how couples can value each otherâ€™s opinions and make decisions together:

character_1_text.eng: My dear, you look worried. Whatâ€™s wrong?

rows.character_1_text: My dear, you look worried. Whatâ€™s wrong?

character_1_text.eng: The stove has not been working very well recently. I think the stove might be broken.

character_2_text.eng: I noticed this too when I was cooking last week. I wanted to ask you: do you think we should buy a new one?

rows.character_1_text: The stove has not been working very well recently. I think the stove might be broken.
rows.character_2_text: I noticed this too when I was cooking last week. I wanted to ask you: do you think we should buy a new one?

character_1_text.eng: Buying a new one would be really expensive. How about we talk about it after dinner, and we can make a decision together?

character_2_text.eng: That sounds great. Thank you for cooking dinner, my dear!

rows.character_1_text: Buying a new one would be really expensive. How about we talk about it after dinner, and we can make a decision together?
rows.character_2_text: That sounds great. Thank you for cooking dinner, my dear!

character_1_text.eng: I am grateful we can talk about this and make this decision together. It makes a lot more sense to try to get it repaired first.

character_2_text.eng: Me too. I feel a lot better now that we have talked about it together.

section_1_text.eng:
ğŸ’¡ Involve your spouse in decision making processes.

section_2_text.eng:
ğŸ˜ƒ It can be hard to know how to involve your spouse when making a decision.

section_3_text.eng: â° Choose a time when you and your spouse are not too busy to discuss decisions, such as early in the morning or later in the evening.

section_4_text.eng:
â° It can take time to get used to making decisions together.
